edu.stanford.pigir.webbase

Class WbRecord

  • java.lang.Object
    • Text
      • edu.stanford.pigir.webbase.WbRecord
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    WbRecordMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object>, java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    WbBinaryRecord, WbTextRecord

    public abstract class WbRecord
extends Text
implements WbRecordMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object>
    WbRecord implements the Java Map interface. So all fields are available via 'get("key")'. The WebBase header keys are defined in constants below. The HTTP header keys are as per the HTTP specification. E.g. 'Content-length', 'content-length', 'Content-type' etc. Case is ignored.

      • isBinaryRecord

        public boolean isBinaryRecord()
        Subclasses whose contents are strings can leave this method stand. But subclasses like those inheriting from WbBinaryRecord must override and return true;
        Returns:
        true if this WbRecord is of subclass WbDefaultRecord. Else return false;
